rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with tactile guidance systems and a ramp for wheelchair access.
Spacious living area with natural light and open layout integrated with the central courtyard view.
Modern kitchen designed for ease of movement with wheelchair-accessible counters and appliances.
Accessible bathroom with features such as grab bars and non-slip floors.

openings.description: Main entrance door with automatic mechanism for wheelchair accessibility.
Large window to ensure ample natural light and air flow towards the courtyard.

central_courtyard.design: landscaped garden with water feature, seating areas, and wheelchair-accessible paths. Adheres to Vastu principles by orienting pathways in a north-south direction for positive energy flow.
